overview:
John Edgar is the co-founder and former CMO at Platinum Networks, the first ISP in North Westren Ontario. After working on Platinum, he went on to found and co-found various IRC networks. It was there that he met the deviantART.com co-founders. After deviantART, John studied digital imaging at Georgian, and upon graduating co-founded a production company and acting as it’s first and only CEO, building the company to over $2M a year in revenue within the first 3 years. John oversaw social communications for various MPs during the Canadian federal election. After taking some time to teach business development and seminars and workshops on finding small business profitability he joined Mingyian as their Senior VP, Business Development.

John sits on the Georgian SDVA Advisory Comity, the Borderland Council for the Arts, Ontario Council for the Arts and Collective Friction Film Collective as well as advising various startups. He as an avid sailor, runner, photographer and loves politics.
